attributes.action: End the practice of MPS flipping mortgages for London homes &keeping profits
attributes.background: Is it right that politicians can make huge profits from their London homes as well as furnishing them and paying for amenities

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find the current rules for MPs' expenses here:

http://parliamentarystandards.org.uk/IPSAMPs/Scheme/Pages/default.aspx
